name: Formatter.Context
desc: The formatting context for a formatter.

items.name: case dynamic
items.desc: A formatting context determined automatically at runtime.

items.name: case standalone
items.desc: The formatting context for stand-alone usage.

items.name: case listItem
items.desc: The formatting context for a list or menu item.

items.name: case beginningOfSentence
items.desc: The formatting context for the beginning of a sentence.

items.name: case middleOfSentence
items.desc: The formatting context for the middle of a sentence.
